p: RALP, robot-assisted radical prostatectomy; LRP, laparoscopic radical prostatectomy; NVB, neurovascular bundle; RP, radical prostatectomy; PSA, prostate-specific antigen; EDR, an examination of the digital rectum; MRI, magnetic resonance imaging; DVC, dorsal venous complex; DF, Denonvilliers' fascia; IQR, interquartile range; UI, urinary incontinence; AFMS, anterior fibromuscular stroma; BMI, body mass index; PSM, positive surgical margin; MDR, median dorsal ralph.
